entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, a boy who is about to see something that makes him feel fear and excitement.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: A friend of Harry's who takes the lead and pulls him forward.

entities.name: war memorial
entities.description: A monument that has been transformed into a statue of three people.

relationships.description: Hermione takes the lead and pulls Harry forward.
Harry draws closer to look at the statue of his parents on the war memorial.
